lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Didn't work last week, why was it going to work this week? Good evening everybody, and welcome to the second part of our Vampire-palooza here on Critical Role. (laughter) Yes. While Matt and Marisha are off on vacation somewhere warm and bright, we will be slinking through the darkness of Los Angeles. Currently, gosh, everybody looks so pretty. Actually, it's really hot in here, so I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We already know where you are. The hood is pointless.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, when did you get here?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all going to have lisps tonight, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to see how long I can last with these fuckers in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you have really big fangs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've already fallen apart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know. If I can talk with a southern accent, I'm fine. But other than that, I ain't good. So I'll give you about ten minutes before these suckers come out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, everybody looks spectacular. That's a great cake, by the way. We'll see how long that lasts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're from Portal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm from Portal! I'm Chell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you're Assassin's Creed? Okay, I guessed on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Liam is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, let me check my Pip Boy. Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really is a Pip Boy! It's so cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam, what is Liam from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's from Fallout, he told me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so impressed so far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what is Travis from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the only one I know. He is Ellie from The Last of Us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the worst Q-Bert cosplay I've ever seen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're Kirby?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Pac-Man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is apparently Pac-Man. This was $14 on Amazon and it does not look like Pac-Man to me. It looks like an M&M.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks like a peanut M&M that's really pretending it didn't have a bad day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little Shop of Horrors meets peanut M&Ms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've had bad dreams about this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really intense. I feel like, yeah, between the two of us, with the $15 costume contest. I'm always a fan of a cheap trip to Hot Topic, so. We have a sponsor tonight! We are being brought to you by Tor Books. Does Pac-Man have anything to--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because they're watching, guys, real quick, they're a huge sci-fi publisher. This is my chance to pitch my book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's really smart!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been pitching it around town, not really getting traction, but they're watching. Captive audience.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you are dressed for success.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of her faces are as gorgeous as her name. With Icarus and Crasnogorofst Nine together, will the universe ever be the same? Think of it like Ender's Game meets Dune, but with Asimov dialog and Heinlein twists, and a little dash of, I don't know, The Name of the Wind or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure there was some Rick and Morty in there too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's available. It doesn't currently have a publisher yet. Also, I haven't written it yet. I'm trying to sell it on the pitch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, good call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Tor Books! Please buy my book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura will be stealing this book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes I will!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On that note of stealing books, I don't know, that was my best segue. It's the segue I have. We go with the segues we have. Merchandise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is that at all having to do with--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't say it was a good segue, I said it was the segue we have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm really-- it's hard to tell if these cameras are on us, but I think that they are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This new setup is very strange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have two things to tell you about tonight. This is good for the holidays.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so excited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are Strongjaw Ale coasters! For your personal Strongjaw bar at home! Look at these fucking-- and they're like, rubbery. They're cool as fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The back of them is pretty cool, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aged six months in a Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like our shirts, man! With our Critical Role logo! It's pretty tight!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's, like, super textured.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In addition to those wonderful stocking stuffers, I have, okay, so these have been in the works for a very freaking long time. Finally, we can announce them! With teeth in our mouth. Okay, okay! So, it's a set of d20s, but they're all inspired by our characters. We designed all of our dice ourselves. And it comes in this Vox Machina logo bag, but it looks like it's from Gilmore's Glorious Goods!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We picked the texture and the color and the design for the d20!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have never sounded nerdier in my entire life, and I love it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the d20s are something different.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, yours is a total troll dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this mine? I can't read it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You specifically asked for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was a long time ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You were like, "I want people to not be able to read it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm a dick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So his is sparkly with purple on pink. It's really hard to read.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth's has antlers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mine is really beautiful because it's inspired by my white dragon armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mine has a big ale of mug on the 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and the 20s have our little icon on the 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the Sarenrae logo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yours is dope, with the two arrows and the bear paw! It looks all marble-ized!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's got the de Rolo family crest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a dagger and a feather crossed into an X.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What nerd got a book on theirs as the 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, what a loser.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who likes books? Except books from Tor Books!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's the segue!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your d20! And it's soft, as with all of our things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Online, right now! They're in the store right now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, I can't believe it finally happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, in the store! Right now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have been working on this for quite a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to, I'll be announcing it. You don't have to. Yeah, I have enough for all of us to take.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, may I use the V.A.T.S. system this evening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did that come from? Oh shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are so fancy! I don't even have a Portal gun, and he's got two guns!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This was a Nerf gun that I got on Etsy, painted by some charming fellow or a lass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This whole game is going to feel so horribly wrong with that accent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the teeth are coming out. I cannot do the whole night with the teeth, no way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to fight it. The Critical Role podcast is up on iTunes, Google, and geekandsundry.com. We're up to apparently episode 55. I know! That's a lot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've done that many episodes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've done over a hundred now. It doesn't feel like that, does it? It doesn't make any sense. I know, slouching toward the end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Pac-Murderer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. It's also available on Amazon Alexa, which I haven't quite figured out what that means yet, but I'm fascinated by the notion of this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, so I can say-- We've talked about this before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've talked about this. We did a whole gag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could say, "Alexa, play Critical Role." I'm going to do it tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Really? It might work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's amazing and it's fabulous, and you two are adorable. It's great. Let's see, what else have we got here? You and Marisha did a thing that got released today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, yeah! Sagas of Sundry: Madness! Came out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The tongue lick after each sibilant is the best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's too much extra shit with them! Too much wax. I'll try again another year. Yeah, Sagas of Sundry: Madness. Ivan led us on a fucking wild ride and scared the shit out of me a little bit, initially.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't seen the prequel yet, but I saw some footage and it looked pretty intense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Came together real good. Real good. Should definitely try it. It's on Project Alpha now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there's a little trailer on YouTube that went up today if you want to get a glimpse. If you want to get an idea of what the thing looks like, the preview episode of the first season is available on Twitch. You can find that and see if you like the idea of people using a giant wooden tower to play a game. It's pretty cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it was nerve-wracking! And it's Halloween, so it's timely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hot in here, so my cake is melting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we eat it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can totally eat it at the break!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boy, am I really looking forward to being on the other side of this piece of wood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why do you think the Mercers went around the planet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, I would escape to another continent myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you mean the Rays.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're kicking it in Australia right now, having a blast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: New one of these next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what are we doing next week? Are we announcing that? One-shot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I choose you, Pikachu.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm doing a one-shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis Willingham one-shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or rather, Grog is running a one-shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a high-concept piece.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog's game-night comes next week, where we will all play Bunions and Flagons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could be a disaster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big math night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lots of algebra, trigonometry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're playing as our characters, playing a game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. A game within a game, if you dare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So all we have to do is outsmart Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty much. But he is the game master, so. Nothing to worry about. Everyone's totally safe and fine. And you're alive, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not even thinking about it, I'm just taken by how handsome you look tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But the Fireflies are on my six, so we should get started.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should not wear makeup more often. I think it really brings out your-- You have a natural glow to yourself right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't worry about going gray, because it's working.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It makes me look far wiser than I actually am. I can reverse math all day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So to keep things moving, because apparently I should do that even though I'm really enjoying this: there's no Talks Machina this Tuesday because it's Halloween. Instead of Talks Machina, you're going to enjoy Eric Campbell's Cthulhu one-shot on the 7:00-10:00 time. Our Wednesday Club this week is going to be Japanese influence on American comics with Erika Ishii, which should be fun. Tomorrow, we are doing our first little Halloween fun with Gather Your Treats on Gather Your Party. You're going to see my real Halloween costume, which is not on theme with this episode. Oh, it's fancy as fuck. It's bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel fancy as fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You look fancy as fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're like, Fallout Glamor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's Geek & Sundry right there. There's the Burbank Airport. Let me check my data. Oh, it's all the secrets!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I apologize, things are going to be a little weird tonight. I've got some tech things that I'm still figuring out. But in the meantime, I think that's the end of announcements.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Starting next week, we're going to be doing a last, final round of Vox Machina character playlists. Whoa. Not everybody's ready. Mine is ready, so we'll start with me. Probably Keyleth after that, and then we'll figure out from there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got, like, half of one. I'll finish it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I've got some really good songs, but I don't have all my songs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you've got about three or four weeks to figure that out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine. I've got plenty of time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do have one extra announcement. I forgot. November 17th, some of us will be attending PAX Unplugged in Philadelphia. There will be Matt and Marisha. Taliesin. Liam will be making it. Laura and I will be in Australia, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, at Supanova, come see!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They'll be there. You can see them Friday night. There will be two things. Let's make sure that I have this right. 1:00-2:30pm Eastern Standard Time is the Critical Role panel and then the signing will be 5:30-7:30 Eastern Standard Time. PAX Unplugged on Friday. Info should be on the website. If it changes stay tuned. If you're in that area, come out, throw things at them because we won't be there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But thankfully there seems to be some sort of break in the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I found it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did find it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job, vampire Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this perhaps is how somebody got access to this building, I don't know. Right now you've got about ten feet of clearance on the little cap that's keeping the fire at bay. A couple of you are still a little hungry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little hungry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not hungry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're sup-- oh, oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're fine at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe, you guys, should I sneak ahead? Should I obfuscate ahead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obfuscate? I don't think you used that term correctly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obfuscate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means you vanish, but you've got to hold still right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we talk for a second about who was that up there? Gary Gygax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. And to our rescue came Matthew Colville.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was he undead? Or was he just a man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think he was a vamp.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Was he?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He may have been a vamp, or maybe he was just a really good guy. You don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he have claws?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He did have claws, briefly. There was some slight claw. You would have noticed that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Gary Gygax, beloved for inventing our cherished game. I'm a snaggle tooth now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just took one out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just took one out, sure. For now. I'll change it, it'll be different teeth at different times. Sometimes there will be none, sometimes there will be both. Let's make it none. And Gygax had very long protruding fingers, like obscenely long fingers, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean he's like, an old vampire? Like, he's been a vampire a really long time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. I talk into a can for a living, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You, Liam O'Brien, know all sorts of stuff about vampires. I, Sam Riegel, do not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I saw The Lost Boys, that doesn't tell me anything about vampires. It's in the movies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't even see Interview With A Vampire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was so good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, we are going to die or undie or something, can we focus in on what are we going to do? Dani's dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know that they're all dead, we just know the Twitch studio has exploded. For all we know, the rest of Legendary is still there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're not going back there now, it blew up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the tunnel backup blocked by debris and other--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To go back up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't tell, but you're welcome to find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well jesus, Taliesin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does my iPhone have any service?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you recall, you got buried without your iPhones last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that's right. We didn't have our phones in the first place. So that thing on your wrist is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to have to read a book like somebody from the olden days now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Being that I have heightened senses, what can I see in our new under the earth situation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just because I feel like being a bit of a jerk, if you're going to use your heightened senses just burn a hunger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, give me a hunger roll, I'm going to do something different. Just roll a d10, tell me what you get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a red d10?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just a red d10.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A six and above is a success right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to remember, yeah I have to remember what is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six and above is a success, and then you'll always have to roll your red dice. You can lose them and gain them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anyone have an extra pencil?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't throw things!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This tunnel that you're in, from what you can see, somebody burrowed somehow. Some creature made this. And it's just big enough for like about two people. And it goes down into a larger tunnel directly below you. It's like a little offset.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we hear any sounds coming from the tunnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you hear sounds coming from the iPad? Let me find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see any slime or hair or anything that's like "Oh this is a--?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can hear the faint distant sound of a little bit of water, a little moisture and it's a big tunnel so down there it could be anything. There's definitely some sound down there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't go back up, it exploded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, our only choice is to travel underground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should probably do that obfuscate thing that you've talked about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or, or we can do the thing that we've learned from being Vox Machina for so long. Who's super fast, like the Flash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you should run ahead, dart ahead of all of the rest of us and check it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I, unlike Vax from Vox Machina, don't have darkvision. Do we have anything that glows?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can see okay. You can't see as well as he can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is above sealed? Help me visualize what's above us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So above you, you're down in a little bit of a tunnel and it's at a bit of an angle and the basically giant circular manhole that is that table has stamped down and seems to be pressured down at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're not getting any firelight or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're feeling some heat but you're not getting any firelight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not seeing anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can kind of see something, and there's a little light coming from the bottom of the tunnel. There's just enough to make out some--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's just enough light coming from the bottom of the tunnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just at the very bottom there's enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely Sam or Laura or Travis should go ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should stay here and be safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good call. Yeah, I'm glad we agree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let the brain hang back and figure shit out, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will kill him first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to go down there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it, go so fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go so fast and dart ahead like 40 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to go so fast like PacMan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or I could sneak down because people can't see me if I do it well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, either one of two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do that. He's not going to go fast, I'm going to sneak in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to do a roll, don't you, or do you just have to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go caw caw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no you don't, you're fine. Roll a d10, tell me what you get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The red?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get one point of hunger. You're fine, you're going to do it, but here have a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get hungrier, but I can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get a little hungrier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But yeah, so you sneak down and the tunnel is larger than you'd expect. It's 12 feet in diameter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I got hungrier, so I've got to put my fangs back in you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a carved out tunnel, but not a technically carved tunnel. There's like some animals that burrowed this big hole but did it very well. Something made this with some skill, but it's not modern. There's something weirdly ancient and a little unsettling about the whole tunnel. It's not a sewer. You were expecting a sewer. It's not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it feel stable?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks very stable and it looks like it's been there a long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it smell like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It smells slightly sour, like the algae that is growing on the walls, this white crystalline algae that gives off a very gentle glow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! So I can see!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a hint.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to lick the algae.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. Last time someone licked something, tasted something--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to lick the algae?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just, like, a little lick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little lick the algae?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not like a big, big lick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That looks so gross with the teeth. The tongue with the-- ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to say it tastes like algae.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm. Not like rat droppings?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I mean, it tastes awful. It tastes of putrescense and death and awful. This shit is disgusting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we know you're fans of rats, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's it look down there, Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! I keep going forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's got this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The tunnel goes down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It keeps going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The tunnel keeps going. You can't see the end of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay, wait. I go back to them. Follow behind me, but not right behind me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far behind you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just, you know, whatever. Like 50 feet behind me. Is that far?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's like here to the door out to the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! And then unless I make noise like a scream or something then you know it's safe, you can keep coming forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you're not really human anymore, you're kind of tough now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm so tough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will follow not so closely behind.

lines.name: SAM, LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be 51 feet behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I go back to where I was and keep walking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yessir.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit, it's like catacombs. Is this serious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so serious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is serious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, I took off my shoes and I've got to say it feels so much better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not doing a good job of quelling the serial killer thing, Sam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are really creepy looking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the eyebrows. Well, I put on this part and I was like it needs something else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's genuinely distracting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look like if the clown from Spawn was trying to be PacMan. Pac McFarlane. PacMan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're probably not going to really run into anything for about a quarter of a mile in going down. And eventually after about a quarter mile you can see a place where the modern sewer system has cut through this tunnel. Like someone hit this and decided to keep going. And so there's a sewer system that's obviously city sewer although very old. coming out at an angle, hits this tunnel, ignores it and continues in an odd way. And this tunnel also keeps going around the corner so you can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can choose?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's some options.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's got to be so many rats in the sewer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. You could have a feast!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't eat rats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She doesn't either. You don't eat rats?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just eat people now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Y'all, rats are super good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're like so fucking good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sofa king?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sofa king.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This tunnel intersects with the sewer. We can either continue through this tunnel and try to figure out, I don't know, why we're vampires and see if there's some source to this power or we go to the sewer and we live.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Live there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean live forever in the sewers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We can hide out in the sewers under LA.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we need--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so into this plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happened to you in that coffin? We're talking about you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you want to solve this? There's got to be a cure right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, wait, we're fucked. We're vampires.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can but, yeah, let me pitch something here. Like we're all tired. We have day jobs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, are we tired?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not what I'm talking about, I mean in general.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam's tired.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got day jobs. We got night jobs. We work a lot. We could be princes and queens of death now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's thinking princes and queens of death? We almost were killed by werewolves and bigger vampires.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's probably other things that are scary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'd be the lowest-- I don't know anything about vampires, but we could be private first class vampires.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, didn't a week go by?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Husbo, you are two hours into being a vampire, if that. You just learned how to run, who knows what else you're going to learn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: True.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also learned that I could kill a man in seconds flat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, raise your hand if you've killed somebody? A person?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wait, sorry. Carry on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I killed a person, I don't know what came over me. It was amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I kill that guy? Did I kill Max when I ate him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Wait no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I killed Max.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you left him for dead. Okay. I'm just checking to make sure like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think Sam's the only one who's actually--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might be holding onto this for no good reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically I did too, but it's not important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just a chick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, who did you kill?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just this chick, up in the Smart Girls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you know who she was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No I didn't know her, remember we were there fucking together?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that girl, yeah. And I guess I probably caused that other boy to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the worst thing to say dressed like PacMan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've killed two people, Travis.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You dress like that, you also eat their ghosts so they're like the soulless, really. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, Travis, not all of us have willpower like you. I get really hungry and if I don't eat, I get really angry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's the truth, preach. I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also I'm really shy and awkward right, but as a vampire it can only get better, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're just committing? After an hour of being a vampire we're saying, "You know what, fuck "it, let's be vampires forever."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: After a few days with these teeth, I think I'll get used to talking with them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to really hurt your commercial auditions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know but I don't do very many of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? You have a good commercial voice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? You think so?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think so. Young mom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Forever. Let's go see the sewer a little more closely. I feel weird about this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just committing to being-- I don't know if I want to stay this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean we can go, we can keep looking. We might die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the sun. It's warm--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sports are played there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, there are night games but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. You can't swim at the beach and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, you can, it's just super dark and swimming in the ocean at night is scary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There might be underground lakes in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, in one of the games I did where I was a vampire, vampires are allergic to water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All water?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is there water in the sewer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a little bit of water in the sewer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to wind over and put my hand in it and let--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's disgusting and probably will give you pink eye. You'll eventually get to find out if vampires get pink eye. I don't know and that's a question for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it hurt though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it didn't hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I don't think we're allergic to water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez, all kinds of things are changing now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His vampire powers are amazing. He clutched this very warm mug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what do you think? Do you want to go to the tunnels some more?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah we've got to progress our lives, our unlives further so we can't stay here arguing whatever we're going to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we've got to go forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to be a vampire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to stay a vampire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm fucking in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have amazing senses, I hear everything that you're saying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not hiding this from you, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then why are you directing it towards her shoulder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just touched myself and you didn't know because I'm so fast that I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I knew that too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You also didn't feel it because you're so fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, you didn't feel anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just adjusted a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a tremor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not hiding anything from you. We'll bring you around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since you do have heightened senses, you can hear some tiny bit of rattling around down one of the sewer tunnels. You can hear some tiny bit of rattling around further down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh wait! Shh. I actually hear something down this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go to the path?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you on point?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But don't forget, this is where the tunnel continues on from where Geek and Sundry was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're going this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll go towards that noise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You head down. It's about 200 feet before you get to a sewer lock off where there's an old power box and a small grate system that the water flows through, but things do not. There are definitely some rats rolling around, and there's a weird brick square chimney that goes off up into god knows where and on the side of the wall is a small lock box/power box with some very old signage on it that's a little hard to read.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll give it a shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I snag one of the rats and fucking rip its head off? And squeeze it like a thing of toothpaste?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me a dex brawl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like an Otter Pop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a Hi-Chew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi-Chew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dex brawl. All the dice. Three successes, two failures. But none of them are red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes, two failures? Not two ones though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two ones, but they're black ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're black ones. Three successes, two black ones. It's hard to read the handwriting, it's a little tricky. Oh no, you were going for the rat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going for the rat, yeah. Toothpaste rat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did not grab the rat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The rat got away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck! I should have eaten somebody. I'm so hungry, I've got all these red dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's read the handwriting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Give me a perception awareness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A perception and awareness. That's not bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not bad. Let's see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to get a rat? Because I'm really good at it now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex and athletics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did really well in school. Except that's cocked. I should just take the six. So I got an X, I got a one on the red, and an eight. One, two, three. Three successes and one--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And one blood failure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really hard to read. Somebody scratched this in. It takes you a minute. It does say "sanctuary."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It says skanktuary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Skanktuary. With a little arrow facing the way you came and either a cross or a T or something below it. And the box has definitely been broken into. There used to be a lock on the box, but the lock is broken. What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, you got it. Give me a blood die back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Can I try to catch one for Travis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Dex brawl again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex brawl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Critical success!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but I got a one on one of my red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get a nice big one for Travis. So you can--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can get rid of one of these?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can get rid of one of these.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gulping and slurping)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It makes a bit of a mess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is disgusting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? I'm trying to embrace it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll wait for a person, thanks. This says "Sanctuary."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can make rat hamburgers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I don't know. Maybe a hideout that's been under here for a while that we didn't know? While vamps were getting--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm less hungry, I can take my teeth out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what you've established now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never mind, they won't come out. I'm stuck like this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a way to continue on down the sewer path or that's it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's some attempts you could make, but the sewer path is definitely treacherous at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's turn around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go to the sanctuary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we follow the arrow where the sanctuary was pointing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Further down that old tunnel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. This tunnel goes on for a long time. What would I call this? If anyone wants to make another perception awareness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will. Okay, Laura's going first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, me too because I'm actually perceptive for once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't give a shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't give a shit and that's fine, that's PacMan life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Two successes, one fail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One one? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it a blood one? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two successes, no failures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've been paying some attention, trying to figure out your direction and where you're going and how long you've been walking. You are starting to go under Mulholland.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Under Mulholland?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're heading towards the Hills. You're getting awful close to it. It's been a couple miles you've been walking underneath this underground tunnel, this really old tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any pavers or anything in this tunnel or does it still look like it was burrowed? Like rudimenti-larily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somebody's been in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're making pretty good distance, I think we're close to Mullholland.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, when I was a teenager in New Jersey, my first job was working for the Department of Public Works, no joke, and we cleaned up after homeless folk, okay. Can I try and read the hobo code?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're proficient in hobo?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll give that intelligence academics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Ooh! Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This marking means "can of beans."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we cleaned up and once I found some nasty old mattresses with some magazines. Some smelly things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was not expecting someone to go for the hobo code.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right underneath Hamilton Park.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if these are taggers?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taggers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taggers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One success. Only one success and one failure on a blood die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, but, no-- oh, that's a five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't roll that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are worse things in the world than one failure on a blood die. Two failures on a blood die is a problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Like dirty magazines on a mattress, that's worse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You end up at the back of the group, because you're staring at this stuff, and it's not ringing a bell at all. This is weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is taking me home, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you're drifting a little bit. I mean, you're a little cloudy, you're not all there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good, I'm going to leave it behind, because I've got a new future now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's our endgame here? We've been walking for miles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we can't go back the way we came, we've got to find a way out, at least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any other tunnels? Or any other peeks up into the daylight, or up top?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just the glow of the algae. Travis, roll just perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, just perception. That is a crit. Two tens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is something right above. There is a creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the tunnel with us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the tunnel with you, directly above you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why do you look like that? What's wrong with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's up, Travis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very thin, it's the same color as the walls, it's almost camouflaged perfectly, and it's vaguely reptilian.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's-- there is-- Don't look up, there's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Speak in code, speak in pig latin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (incoherent mumbling) There's something above us, and it's reptilian looking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You look up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm backing away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm drawing my XLR whip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It goes scurrying at high speed when you look up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Forward or back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back from the direction you came. It darts back there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going for it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I take off after it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What level of Celerity are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some sort of lizard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lizard? Like a person lizard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something lizardy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It says you are capable of an incredibly fast response time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, you're using Celerity two, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, what does that mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Celerity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Celerity two. I'm looking at the wrong thing, here we go. I'm trying to be good about this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May use your dodge skill against firearms, you don't suffer penalties--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, you can actually climb vertical surfaces with Celerity Two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have Grace that makes me climb any vertical surface no matter how slippery or flimsy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a hunger roll. Roll a d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just 1d10?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just 1d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, burn a hunger, so you're about to get--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I have plenty, you don't need to give me any more, I've got five over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have five? I thought you weren't hungry at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just not giving them back to you when I'm done because that's silly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, well, fine. I marked them all up and made them all pretty for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I? Do I roll one of these?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well you did, and you just got an extra one, so you're now at one hunger and you're peckish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I don't catch him, or what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do catch him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are fast and you climb up the wall and you come in contact with a humanoid lizard, who turns, looks at you with big, gold eyes, and (hissing screech).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will try to grapple him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my mic cable, I'm going to try and wrap it around his snout, so he can't open his snout.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here we are, roll strength brawl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strength brawl, that's my forte. Oh, boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There will be brawl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes? Yep, you grab onto a leg and you've got a flailing angry lizard person currently grappled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all giving chase, we're trying to catch up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm trying to hog tie him while I say: get over here! I need help!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (hissing) "Let go! Let go!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! He talks!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasping) Oh my god, what is it? Can we eat it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You turn so quick, god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we like warm blood, we like mammals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm following, too, but not that fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to tie him more secure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun, give me one more strength brawl.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two successes, one fail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two successes, one fail? Is the fail on the red?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it's a blood die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you keep doing that? Oh, is it a fail or a one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a one, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means you get another--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that means I can maybe-- you were very lucky. Yep, he's not doing well with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hog tying him. I went to a rodeo once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty fast, could I get there and try and help?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long has it been? It's been two-- yeah, you're there by then. He didn't get very far. Celerity is mean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck is that thing?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, it talks, who are you, what are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (hissing monster noises) "Let go!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll unhand you if you tell us who and what you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No vampires!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His name's Slock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or lock. Or rock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Lock."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys doing okay down there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stay back Liam, it's too dangerous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is your tunnel? We just became vampires an hour ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (hissing) "Vampires? Two weeks in my tunnel, two weeks!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We've always been here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're the lizard people of Los Angeles!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I knew they were true!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am genuinely amazed that you actually know that there are lizard people beneath the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Of course, man. The rest are in DC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. That is some deep LA myth, man. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We want to let you go, we don't mean you any direct harm, but we need to know how to get out of this tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long does the tunnel go? Where can we find an exit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can we not be vampires anymore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to eat him. "I don't want to be a vampire." We're going to eat him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What's wrong with you people?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're new at this. You've been here for what, a millennia or something? We've been vampires for I guess two weeks, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I twice have been beneath cities since its inception. For thousands of years we have "lived-- You are supposed to know this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We had an arrangement with you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're literally hours into this thing, we don't mean any offense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one guided us through the change. We had no bar mitzvah or whatever you call it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You people are way too pitiful to be vampires."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, hold it, take it easy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have powers, all right? Look at this. And I walk up around the tunnel, like in a loop-de-loop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I can do that. I don't really--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm not a lizard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but what about this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't work if we're actually watching you, you know that right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like you got fuzzy for a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been listening in and I come in and say: What about this? And I use Presence Awe on him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to try Presence Awe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to double check my--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do I roll? Charisma plus persuasion is all it says.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So give me a roll of 1d10.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Well, charisma plus persuasion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well first give me a hunger roll since I'm learning how to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, I failed it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got a one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's my lizard?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two successes, and one failure on a blood die. A lot of failures on a fucking blood die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, oh, what, nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're rolling crap tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you're not alone. Yeah, Lock's looking at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you work in the business?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's an agent at UTA.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gets about that much sun. "And-- hmm."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bottom line, we don't mean you any harm, I mean, we're hungry, but you're not really our--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I wouldn't recommend it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not our diet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I untie you, do you promise not to run away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you help us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'd be most grateful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just the basics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I can bring you to someone you can talk to."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they going to kill us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "I don't know. Yes, like me. We'll see."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you take the vampire teeth out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I blame you two, you've put it in my head!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's the best we can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will untie the beast. Is he more crocodile?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's got a flattened face and very big gold eyes and sharp shark teeth in the mouth. It's a very big chop. But he's thin and smaller.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we release you, pinky swear that you're going to help us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't know if he has pinkies. Well, yeah, he could put something out, put a claw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to manipulate him or persuade him or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can. Do you want to do charisma or manipulation?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, did my glamor work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't know. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not as good at it as Vex is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give you charisma persuasion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Watch where you point that thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stamina.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stamina!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hashtag Stanima. They made us character sheets with "stanima" on them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I know this is weird, but I swear we've met."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You seem really familiar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You look very familiar."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Do you ever go to Jinky's?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not Nerdist. I mostly know Geek & Sundry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Might have been Smart Girls, to be fair to you. You'd never know if there were lizard people working.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we know him; let's release him for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before we do: we're idiots, right? We're brand new. Obviously, there's been some sort of peace between above and below, and we just want to facilitate that, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "That seems fair, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's been released. I release him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Come. I'll take you to the chamber."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who will we be meeting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, that depends. We'll see." You're going to follow him further down?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. As we're walking from behind, can I use my Aura Perception to see what his true motives are as he's leading us to this chamber?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. Roll a blood die. Just one die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You rolled a one, didn't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, a red one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get another hunger. What are you at now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was at three, down from the four from my wife rat! Now I'm back up to four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a proper die? Did I give you one with an x? It doesn't matter. You know if you rolled a one. Now you can roll your check for that. That was to see if you get hungrier from using it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In real life, or as a vampire?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! Can we cut that cake?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's one blood one and three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One blood failure? It's going to take you a little while to figure it out, but he seems frustrated. You get a frustrated vibe from his aura.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But not the "I'm leading them into a trap?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing duplicitous yet. If anything, you're getting a little activity up here like he's wracking his brain trying to figure out what is going on. He seems just as confounded by this, perhaps. You go down a little further through this cave until you come into a huge clearing that is-- that was amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I whip my hair back and forth!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hot in here, so if you could keep doing that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At home, if you want to simulate the studio right, pump that heat up to about 100 degrees. It's great. There's a big interior cavern that you seem to be under. You're probably pretty deep now. We're probably deeper than the subway tunnels. Probably, just barely on the other side or a little further past Mulholland, maybe a little deeper. And you come into these two giant stone lions that have started to decay and crumble and there's a big, beautiful stone sign that is decaying, falling apart and covered with this strange luminescent moss and it says Luna Park.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not the restaurant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah! I was thinking of the restaurant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you know the restaurant? I'm so impressed by you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We love that place. It's so good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As you come in, you pass through these arches and there's this strange what can only be described as a supervillain's lair. This is an abandoned theme park. Underground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! That's creepy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lake in front of you with a beautiful boardwalk that has crumbled into disrepair. There's a strange pyramid volcano in the distance. There's a strange little amphitheatre to the left that looks like an ancient Roman colosseum, odd gardens with strange luminous plants growing. If you peek in the back, you can see the beginning of cages, perhaps for animals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How big are we talking? Like an NFL stadium?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slightly less than. About half a stadium.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know what the size and shape is, Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just in one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll tell you what, not that we don't have, but if you want to see it. You can get a notion of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn, this is big!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which direction did we enter from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will, at some point, post that on the internet so that people can see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez Louise. That's big and intricate. What is his name?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lock. What is Lock doing right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is guiding you past the lake to a strange--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this the old zoo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is still underground?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. I'll tell you about this at the break and then I'll tell you where that map came from. It's fascinating. This is my other hobby that I'm bringing into this game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Collecting old lizard maps of LA?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, Taliesin's so immortal, he remembers the civilizations that preceded--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 5000 years ago. 5000 years is how long lizard people have been in Los Angeles. Man. No, I got shit. As he brings you past the lake and he brings you past the amphitheatre and the strange gardens with these strange luminous lilies and these orchids that are growing that never seen sunlight, you come to this weird old Victorian house that's obviously a facade into a basic black box, like in an amusement park. And above it, it says "The House of Trouble."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Treble?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The House of Trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's music in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not the House of Treble. The House of Trouble, not treble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm pretty sure you said "treble" twice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, then you're going to be very disappointed when you go in. And he gestures for you to enter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to come in with us? Is it scary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, there's music! It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you not allowed in there, Lock?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Inside will be those who know what to do with the four of you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Without a proper introduction, how will we know who we're talking to? We really need you in there with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I'll follow."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who should go in first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's big and strong!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We choose leaders based on size? It should be on intelligence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Travis goes first, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Absolutely. But not because he's strong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your intelligence rating? Three and mine's four. So yeah, I'll do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you know what? Mine is four as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the dumbest one?! Thanks, Taliesin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin's brother.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My brother! Thank you, Alex Jaffe for making a judgment call there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Out of those guys, I think Sam's probably the dummy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, maybe if you had gone to Burning Man, he would have a better opinion of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this Tibet's doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's Alex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's okay. Okay, great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Both of my brothers are now dipping their head in panic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura and I will co-lead this venture into the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam, you stay back. You have to be safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure? Okay. If you insist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think that's actually a good idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only if you insist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, in fact, just stay behind Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My normal place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a smart place to be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Duh, that sounds good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not taking that three very well, are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going to the big house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're sitting in a pit in a theater, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like it was all done at the same time, or has it been added over time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all too old to tell. It's like walking into a temple. It's hard to tell what came first and what didn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How big is the house? How many seats?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: About 50.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's like a surgical theater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's about 20 lizard men gathered around, taking a look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Specifically lizard

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You probably can't tell gender yet. And I wouldn't even necessarily know how one would tell gender off the top of my head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got some ideas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knew you would. There is obviously a leader. Lock is coming in from the back and is joined by two or three others who are not pressuring you inside but definitely making sure you're not about to run. As you enter and stand in the center of the theater, Lock turns to the lizard creature in the largest, most ornate gold chair, and turns and says, "My lord Kotori, "we found them in the tunnels, but I don't think they are necessarily the ones that have been "causing our problems." And Kotori takes a moment, looking over all four of you. "Well. Explain "yourselves, then. What are you doing in our tunnels, when we have a very fair agreement with "the vampires above that you mind your own business?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I step forward and begin to talk using Presence Awe again. Which is charisma.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll your blood and then roll your charisma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I roll a single blood die? That's a two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get one more hunger. Where are you at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm at four. I'm real hungry, lizard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What am I going to do with that? Hold on. All right, you're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good. You got a critical success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One critical success?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He got two tens on blood dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two tens? Oh my god. On blood dice? That changes things, okay. That's good to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We mean no disrespect or harm, and are in awe of what you have built here. We have wandered down by accident due to calamity and we are children of the night in the purest sense. And we ask for patience and empathy for the unwise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Theater training.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it worked. Definitely seems like he's looking at you with nodding respect. Another gaunter lizard comes up to Kotori on the side. "Be careful of this one. I think he's trying to "manipulate you." And Kotori sits and looks at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go further. We are in fear and awe of this council. No fucking joke. And all we want is safe passage and understanding. We don't mean to subvert or cause problems. Merely to survive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There are rules and protocols in place for these things. And ignorance of the law is not "absolution from the law. However, you did not know. And the fact that you did not know goes to show "there's something very wrong. You should not exist and not know this. Somebody has made a mistake."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Things are kind of crazy out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if you could undo it and make us humans again, I think we'll be on our way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He doesn't speak for all of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I can make you lizards."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds amazing.

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Super cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would be really great, but we're still getting used to this, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Might be too soon for a jump right away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughing) "No, I can't do that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, you got us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "But you're funny. You're not as smart as the other ones, are you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Apparently not. I mean, we haven't compared SAT scores or anything, but we will later tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not the real John Malkovich. This is like a pretend John Malkovich. John Malkovich playing a pretend John Malkovich. We'll pretend you aren't super keen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You look like a serial killer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So disturbing. It's really hard to work through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My 1600 will hold up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, obviously the four of you are not our problem. But the fact that you're down here is "our problem. There have been vampires in our tunnels for three weeks."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three weeks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There are rules, there are protocols, and obviously they have been ignored. Do you have "any notion of what has been going on? Do you perhaps have any kernel of thought as to the "nature of this? Why have people been in our tunnels?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not going to fluff us up. We don't know much but we did come in contact with some sort of vampire lord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Interesting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a giant meatball that seemed to be turning people into other things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's true. There was also, I mean, some sort of void under the game table, right? That could have plunged people down below?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. There was a guy that we know that when we woke up all of a sudden he was a wizard and he had electricity coming off of him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And are you familiar with one Gary Gygax?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As he's about to speak, from the back, one of the other lizards goes, "I've heard of Gary Gygax."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Many of us have. We were surprised to see him up and walking about a mere hour after we woke and found ourselves in this state.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This other lizard comes up and starts whispering in Kotori's ear. Seems very excited about something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you play D&D?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He might be a Critter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We have internet down here, we're not savages. Apparently members of our council are "aware of your show."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're everywhere! Critters are everywhere!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are everywhere. You are literally everywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we grab any posters or fan art on our way out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They all burned up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things would have gone so much better if you had.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I have some merch we were going to sell in my pocket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's always one guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want coasters? I've got some Strongjaw coasters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kotori is giving you an eye, but the other guy is not making eye contact, he's breaking and making eye contact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he as old as the rest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hard to tell, man. What's the difference? Can you tell the difference between an old iguana and a young iguana?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sort of, like the scales are less vibrant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They look pretty healthy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, how much is the iguana talking about IRAs and shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. We just want to know what's going on with us. We just want to know what's going on. We don't know anything. Is there something we can do to help you that will, you know, we help you, you help us, help us figure out what's happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any way to be of service? We don't mean to offend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're good at catching rats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm really good at rat catching.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's really fast. I can sense things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sneaky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also, do you have any human prisoners down here or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Sadly, we do not."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any other animals that you don't care about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Sadly, no. The few animals we do have here have purposes. In the menagerie. But perhaps "we can come to an arrangement."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're very interested in that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Something has gone wrong. We are going to have to re-establish some rules, and you're "obviously someone else's problem."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Clearly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We will give you passage to the surface. We will show you where you can come in "contact with some individuals who can clear things up."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Passage to the surface?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We will send you to the people whose problem you are, as opposed to ours. And in return "you will deliver a message. You will tell them that we are displeased and that we have to have "words and that they must find a way of becoming friends with us again. We will need--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A boon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "A boon. They will owe us for their transgression. And you will deliver our message."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. It doesn't seem like a great message to deliver to someone. Just saying, like, they might be upset with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
