lines.text: "Oh, they may kill you. Vampires are not known for their kindness."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we might change that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we're really nice. Pretty genuine--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a good talker these days. These hours. If I could maybe eat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're very interested in getting to the surface. We will deliver your message as you've described it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gratefully.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I feel like if it's nighttime we should probably hurry. Because we can't be up there when the sun comes up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it'll kill us. I saw what happened to Matt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You won't have to be up there for very long. Lock! Mahlo! Take them to the pyramid. Show "them to Los Globos."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been a lizard person, Lock? Have you always been a lizard person?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yes, of course."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you thousands of years old?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No, we've been here for thousands of years. I am merely 250, 300 at this point."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Infancy. Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Just wondering.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You'll know what that feels like if you're lucky."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) That's what I'm talking about, Travis!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we might not change back you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what about our friends, our family?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and fashion trends? They're such a bitch to keep up with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're just going to give up everyone you know and love to be immortal sewer vampires?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Sam! Yeah! This feels great! I mean, I'm hungry, but we get to spend time together for fucking ever!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love hanging out with you, but it's not like we can podcast from down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They've got internet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We have actually really good broadband down here. It's insane."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question. Have you heard AllWorkNoPlay? Any episodes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Of course, yeah. I've listened to the whole thing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got nothing. You've got nothing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Their router obviously runs through Malaysia.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll think about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're ready to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Good luck. And, Lock, see if you can't wrangle them up something to eat on the way up "there." Lock nods and starts leading you all, along with Mahlo, who's definitely not quite grinning. I'm not entirely sure what you would call this weird curl at the side as they lead you to the pyramid at the very back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it one of these smiles?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's one of those.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like an iguana smile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, cute. Marlo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mahlo, Lock, Kotori are the three we've met so far. Mahlo and Lock are taking you to the pyramid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which leads to Los Globos?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anyone speak Spanish? What does Los Globos mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so amused by all of this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Globos. What does that mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As you walk back across the lake, past the not-quite-abandoned zoo, but slightly abandoned, there are definitely some creatures in there that look vaguely familiar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not typical, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's something a little off about all of them. It's as if somebody had grabbed a mountain lion and bred them for a few centuries and saw what happened without sunlight. So they've all started to lose their eyes and they've all got the little bit of milky, appendage eye. Everything's gotten a little weird down here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creepy. Ooh, very much like The Descent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there's a lot, again, that white luminescent algae everywhere. That spiky, crystalline white luminescent algae is everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. I'm excited to get up top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So as you climb the steps of the pyramid, and I'm going to also point out, this is obviously a man-made pyramid and maybe only about 80 years old, and like, Disneyland-bullshit pyramid, definitely a little iffy and has seen better days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, so, careful. I do not want to get Mercer-ed. Or you guys, but especially me. Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't want to get Mercer-ed? Or Marisha-ed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or that. I feel like Marisha-ed is worse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Marisha-ed is worse, in my opinion. If you're going to go, go quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worse, but Mercer-ed seems easier to happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That requires a Power Ranger helmet, too. You make your way up the slightly cartoonish pyramid. At the very top, there's another one of those weird little square cube exits that you saw in the sewer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the pyramid goes all the way to the top?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All the way to the top, and then there's a drop ladder that goes right into a little brick cavern. It's only big enough for one person at a time, and you have to crawl up on those awful fire escape ladders from the 40s, and there's more of that awful white crystalline algae.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go first this time. I'm very perceptive. I can hear and smell and see things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really high though, baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go and I try to fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool, actually-- I'm so fucking with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, damn it! I thought I was going to Lost Boys that shit. Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You cool. You ain't that cool. Are you actually going to try and--? Give me a dexterity athletics.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Wait, (mumbling). All successes, no failures, and one ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many successes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't fly, but you manage, after you make a good leap, and by the time you realize that gravity is reasserting itself upon your person, you are smart enough to extend your hands and legs out and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flying squirrel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was very impressive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baby, did you fly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't want to show off too long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy--!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to turn into a bat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See, vampires are fucking awesome. Your husband can fly. My husband can run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are we going to do this? Give me a willpower check. Just straight willpower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing? You're trying to turn into a bat? Oh my god. Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three successes? You do not give a little squirt of poop, then. Well done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (straining)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You feel it, but it stays up inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't be bats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But maybe we can walk through walls and shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't tried it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I make my way up toward the ladder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eventually, after quite a few feet, that ladder goes up and up and up. It's about 450, 500 feet before anything stops.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're all in the top of this ziggurat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then it's a 90 degree turn and that brick cavern goes straight out. It is a very claustrophobic crawl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yelling) Travis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the ladder goes straight up, and then it turns?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just L's really hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the surface, or into more under-earth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More underground, in that same cube that's not big enough to stand up in. It's about maybe three feet by three feet. It's a little claustrophobic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blam!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm up here. There's a tunnel that continues at the top of this stupidly, absurdly long ladder. It's only single-file. I guess you guys can make your way up here, and we can crawl wherever this goes. Will you ask Mahlo if we're supposed to crawl through this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mahlo, are we supposed to crawl through that tunnel? He's nodding!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Well, go ahead and come up. I'll get started.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll give you a boost, but how are we all going to--? Okay. This comes naturally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I hear anything in the tunnel, now that I'm up there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to listen, or do you want to

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With four red dice, I'll just listen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you still have that cable?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course. It's all coiled up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that you're Indiana Jones-ing this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So one of us boosts the other up, drops the cable. Don't dick me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course not, but I don't know if an XLR cable will hold us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got to. I mean, neither of us are Willingham.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could try to jump.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could try. It's not going to be pretty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I'll lift you up. My powers, I can walk up walls and shit, can't I? There's no wall to walk up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thousands of feet away! We're at the top of a ziggurat looking at the ceiling!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I see anything, like a switch or a button, to lower something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, although, I mean, you're way up there, now. You've left these plebs behind. Lock will also look around and do the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he can help!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Lock, can you boost my friend?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yes, of course, yes. We can do that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll sign, like, a Player's Handbook.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I don't care." Mahlo is losing their shit a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't offer to Mahlo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It hurts, man. I give you a Critter, and that's how you--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to drop the dice down to Mahlo as I'm climbing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mahlo will remember this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep climbing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so you boost me up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mahlo, come here. Let me find a Sharpie. I write on his arm, "VAX ///" Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Cool!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, you're so cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not, but that's what I did. I'm not at all. And I step on Sam's back and I jump.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. This is not hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dex athletics, okay. Ooh, well, one success on a blood die, and one fail on a non-blood die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing bad happens, but you miss on your first attempt. You can get one more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same shit? Yeah. Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all you needed. Actually, I should have done the-- never mind. I can use that next time. I keep forgetting I have this mechanic they gave me that's super cool, and I'm not taking advantage of it. Sorry, White Wolf. I'll start doing that, because it's a cool mechanic. I think they're in chat. Yeah, you make it. You're crawling up. You guys are going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, boys, can you help my friend up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, they'll give you a little boost up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can get, at whatever speed you like, that you want to get up there, because you are fast as all hell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hang with Liam. Got to stay close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm already up and behind. I'm second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a long tunnel to crawl to. It is not comfortable. It is a little claustrophobic. It's a little cramped. I want everyone to, really quickly, roll a d10 for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so big in a small space. Seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Non-success. Four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, here we go. There's my chart of pain. Let's give you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to be wearing this costume every day for the next few days. This is my Halloween costume.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really bad. Maybe get a different one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura, my eyes are up here, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to have a really hard time being clever. It's just that, yeah. It doesn't feel good. You get what I'm getting at? Travis, do you understand? Are you sure you're clear?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah. I will fucking fang you right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You come out, as you finally breach through, and you seem to be in a crypt in the Hollywood cemetery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're within a mausoleum, or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see a door? Is there a door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a gate. It is unlocked. This is practically an easy access to the surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything cool in this room? Are there buttons?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are two caskets stacked on the side, other than this little broken hole in the floor that you came through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A metal gate? That we can see through?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, you can see through it. It's just a gate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it night still?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is still night. Just barely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, there's a gate that prevents us from leaving this crypt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's not locked or anything. It's just a gate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anybody else want to open the fucking door, for once?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is getting a little cramped in here because it's only big enough for, like, four coffins, and it's already two coffins full.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any writing in here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a name-- No, there's actually no writing on the inside. It's all on the outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open the gate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I duck behind one of the coffins.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's filthy. But other than that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, you step out into the late night. It feels like time did not move at an appropriate speed, like, the night is still darker than it should be. You don't know how long you were down there, but it feels like you were down there a little longer than this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible an entire day passed while we were down there? Because it's still real super dark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's entirely possible, but you're not sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were so fast that we got here in like ten minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a name on the outside of the crypt that we walked out of?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. It just says "Macbeth."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now that's happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hollywood cemetery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there humans around?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are definitely some humans around, just walking around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it movie night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is not movie night. For those of you who don't know, we have movie nights at our cemetery because that's fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a goth party?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a goth party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just regular humans, nobody seems scared? They're not running around, it's not scary?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they look like they're paying their respects?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They look like hipsters in Hollywood, hanging out at the hipster cemetery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay. Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you guys going to feed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! I am going to do a little natural selection. Is there anyone that looks like they are weak and clearly ailing and ready to have it all come to an end?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking for loners.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you walk around a little bit--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm suddenly super uncomfortable with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a group of these guys, of these humans?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to look around and find a potential victim? I'm going to say right now, from your experience, it is possible not to kill people when you drink from them, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: I know you guys are hungry, but let's do this smart. I'm fast, you're stealthy, right? Okay, how about this. Me and Laura will go around. I'll chase them toward you. Laura can keep them contained, and we'll drive them to you guys rather than us trying to chase them, we'll drive them this way.

lines.text: We don't care. This is how they've been here for five thousand years. No one cares. Yeah, there's a, well, there's always the porta-potties.

lines.text: You're into it? All right. As you curl around, there's usually that little set that are out by the street, and there's not too many people in the cemetery tonight, wandering around being silly.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're like, thunk, thunk! And all you hear from the inside is, "Dude, really? Come on!"

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so hungry. Oh no, I need another blood die. That's great. Three successes, one failure.

lines.text: Three successes, one failure?

lines.text: But one failure? Okay, the door unlocks, starts to swing open, and you're in. You didn't even look? You're going for it?

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: You're going to top off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's top off.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Thank you. Just wake him up and tell him he's going to be a vampire soon. Mike, Mike! How are you?

lines.text: "Oh, you totally bit me! Oh!"

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I come waltzing up. Oh my god, I just did a bump of Friedle. I mean, I just bumped into Friedle. It's crazy, the odds. Yeah! He's here!

lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Totes. We'll take you to where you need to go." And we're going to take a break while we take a gentle stroll to Los Globos. That got so weird. I'm so pleased. I hope, now that Mike has survived, I hope you all take a moment to go check out his YouTube channel. It's quite pleasing. Mike Diva. Thank you guys, we'll be back in a few minutes. There's also going to be a giveaway in the chat, but I think that's all going to be in the little video. There's going to be a video about the password. Otherwise, we have dice.

lines.text: And we have coasters.

lines.text: That's a lie. The cake is a lie.

lines.text: It was actually a really good cake! I feel a little guilty for eating it. The winner, by the way, of our contest in the chat room was Sharpe_liquid. Sharpe liquid. Congratulations! That's a great little call sign. That's pretty cool. I hope you guys are enjoying this ridiculousness. I had to take some layers off because it's really hot!

lines.text: So serious. This is super, super serious.

lines.text: Are we doing this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A voice from above says--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two successes, one blood fail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two successes, one blood fail? This guy ain't that bright.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a lot of fails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah, but those don't count. It's only blood fails that count.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "This is more than I'm really up for. This is a "lot." He's just going to shove. "I can't--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, the old bite someone's finger off to get in the VIP section trick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was not a good night for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the wound continuing to bleed or does it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did my blood heal him at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to think about making your finger not be a problem anymore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to try to meditate upon that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to put the finger back onto the stump to see if seals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold it. Maybe it will coagulate or scab over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a hunger die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Losing one finger is not

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me see. Hold on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Better than one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to find all my stuff-- here we are. Your finger does not grow back, but it stops bleeding and crystallizes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does my blood look like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a deep, dark crystalline red. It's got a little bit of shimmer to it, not twilight sparkle! Motherfuckers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that's actually the name of a show.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Twilight Sparkle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a character from My Little Pony.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Secret messages.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's something about it that's a little brighter. There's something about it that's a little more--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brighter than the rest of these murdering fucks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's something about it that's supernatural.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to suck his severed finger like a popsicle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am going to

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get anything out of it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really, really awful fanart, but beyond that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (slurping) (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The best. The best fanart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Always you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop sucking on my husband's finger!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not the worst thing I've seen in a vampire game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura! I feel like you're really unsafe up there without me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see us go up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely. I saw the altercation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come back down. He's the last one, I swear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me check. (scoffs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love you! Thanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to try and heal your wrist too, as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get any blood out of the finger?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's probably for the best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In Interview with a Vampire, it's bad to feed on other vampires.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I didn't know. I haven't seen that! I haven't seen that, because that's the one with Tom Cruise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? It's bad to feed on other vampires.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, are we supposed to be referencing films for this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty much what you have to go on right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's dead blood, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But in the book series I read, vampires fed on other vampires and it was totally chill.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Book series?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rob me of all my joy. I will remember this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then what? I heal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're healed for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I get my health point back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we make our way to the top of the stairs. What do we see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is where the

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The music doesn't really change too much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's just a different track of the same vibe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it feel like Blade? Like, are people dressed super-cool?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, actually. There's a lot of black leather; there's a lot of black vinyl. People have obviously dressed up and done nice makeup. You can't tell if necessarily everybody is wearing the nice makeup, but it's definitely-- these are some pretty people who have gone out of their way to be extra pretty tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's on the fringes that stands out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, the music. Are we talking things that I would recognize? Chemical Brothers, your Fat Boy Slims?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fat Boy Slim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're such a gift. Ugh. Nothing. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any tables in the corner? Anywhere where it looks like important people would be sitting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are some little corner tables all around the outskirts. There's obviously a couple dance boxes. But there are corner tables all around the outskirts, but they all seem roped off and there are definitely people sitting there who seem like they have these tables on reserve.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any golden thrones?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No golden thrones. Just wumpa wumpa music, a couple go-go boxes, a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bar?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a bar. There is a very nice bar. Three sides, two bartenders.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to go on the dance floor and see if I can chat anybody up. Excuse me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you really just doing the Chattanooga Choo Choo? I really hope you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With a white man's overbite.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Are you going to try and chat up a guy or a girl?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A female. Using my vampiric charms, I'm going to say: Hey! Where is he tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where... is he?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is he tonight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, the big man. You know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The girl who has her back towards you, who was ignoring you, turns around, and Satine looks you in the face and says, "What the fuck are you talking about?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh hey!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Hey Sam!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! You know, the guy who runs the show. The guy who runs the club, the most important of us here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Did you-- is

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "So you're all--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's how it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "All right. That's cool."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you always been like this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah. Why?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There are no-- we come in and shoot at night, man. Have you not been paying attention "this whole time?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know most of the crew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You are really oblivious. It's like--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey. We're a little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Hey."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And hey, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, no, you're-- wow, you got the whole thing going on."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We're unlikely, I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Wow. This has been a rough week, then. Okay!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pretty good though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No, you look like you're doing okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then join me.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What happened?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My dark gift.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "This is a once-a-week thing, it's very exclusive. I'm amazed, even with this that you "guys got-- This is a very serious thing, like this is-- this place."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Satine, can you help us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah. What do you need? You want a drink? You need anything?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, do you know what happened there? Do you know what happened up at the studio?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I mean, TwitchCon was this week. I've been really busy. I've got a whole--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt and Marisha are dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Like dead?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Like ashes and mushrooms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, nobody told us what was going on. We just woke up in coffins.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Holy shit. Okay. Hold on--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that how it normally goes down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Nah, this is weird. Normally, there's a lot of talk about-- Okay, I'm going to talk to a "few people. You guys-- hmm."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before you go, have you seen Taliesin? He's the only one we haven't seen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh god. You know, I've been asking him to come out to this club for ages and he just "never comes out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he like us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I mean, not that I'm aware of... He's his own thing. That's just a whole thing, but "you know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he here tonight? Have you seen him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "As far as I know, he's never been here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who runs this club? Whose club is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, that's a complicated story we'll get into. That's complicated, but it's good that "you're here. We're going to work this out. Why don't you guys just don't ruffle any feathers? Go "have a drink."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any recommendations from the bar?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Have a cocktail."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Special menu?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "The whole menu's special. It'll be good."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. I head towards the bar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were buried with no money. Does that matter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No. You're fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this like a mushroom--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You got a Twitch show! You're great!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think they have any Ace of Base records that we could request?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw the sign...

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: (singing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) "Thankfully, this is a club that caters to people whose tastes haven't changed in "decades, so you're going to be-- You're going to fit in, but no. No Ace of Base. I'll be right back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go to the bar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Barkeep! Would you thrill us with four glasses of whatever you would like tonight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something red.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dealer's choice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blood. We would like to drink human blood. We need human blood to drink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I got just the thing. Hold on."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, that's so gauche.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He goes and there is literally a tap that gets pulled and a red foamy lager.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does somebody scream when it gets pulled? (yelling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pulls four weird foamy beers that are definitely-- St. Valentine's Day Specials, is what I'll say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they smell Irish? European?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They smell, if I had to place it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has a nose of--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the best, it's tomato juice and vodka and just a little something special, a little bit of Worcestershire. It's got a little bit of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drink it up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A toast. I feel we're finally in a sort of safe place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're civilized.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the new world order, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To our fallen--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Homies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. May they live forever as dust and spore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And to the confidence that we all have, having killed a human being.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking A.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True vampires.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: True vampires! Just kidding, baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drink up! To rats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First kill, man. It just felt so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just because it was Mike!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're sleeping in your own coffin tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have a double wide.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: California king!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. I'd never even thought about that and now it's going to be the only thing I think about for the rest of the night. What's a California King coffin look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Comfy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very comfortable. They're not comfy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would the Briarwoods do? Like a side car?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we sip these drinks and we turn our backs to the bar, posting up like one does, can I see with my Heightened Senses anyone giving us a look of malcontent?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A look of malcontent? There's a mix of faces in the crowd. There's definitely some indifference, there's some people who are eyeing you very suspiciously, and a few smiling faces who seem delighted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before I look at the smiling faces, do I get any whiff of a giant dog in the crowd?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would require a blood roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we get rid of one of our blood dice from this lager?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perception and investigation. Jesus--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I love the toss.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use the Heightened Senses aspect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You also lose a blood die because of-- if you have one, you have to be at one at all times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two successes? Yeah, something smells a little doggish. There's a little wolf, but it's not what you had last time. It's something else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I focus on the smiling faces and see what we see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there's definitely a bouncing, bobbing Erika Ishii who's jumping around the crowd, having a good time and she just seems happy that's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura? Erika Ishii's here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (squealing) I run over and start dancing with Erika.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As she sees you, (squealing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you a vampire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What? I mean, yeah!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh my god!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been a vampire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, ages!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that would make so much sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Doesn't it? Sunscreen. It's a trick."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her hair's so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the undead. Hair of the undead. It's the haircut that did it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is all the energy vampiric?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From her? I mean, that makes sense, doesn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it? Because I want some of that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a different vibe than you've got, sadly. You've got a different vibe going on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Erika?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah. Yeah! Hey!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are the people that run this place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are the people that run this place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, I mean, they're here!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we find them? How do we know what's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I don't know! What's going on is just a party! It's great! Yeah!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's so great!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a lot for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting) "I'll be right back!" She bounces out. There's a few minutes of sitting, watching this crowd. There's definitely, slowly starting to become more concerned faces checking you out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Checking

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: None that we recognize, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, give me a perception awareness, just for fun. Just see if you maybe know any of these people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still riding high on Friedle. I start dancing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A critical. Two tens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Critical success? Yeah, there's a few people that you're starting to recognize, but not people you know personally, but there's definitely--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Celebrities?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a few people who have a TV deal in here. There's a couple serious TV deals in here. There's definitely a couple familiar faces rounding around. Nobody that you're close to, but there's a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is a happening spot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're nodding and obviously talking about something and after a while, somebody comes up and talks to Erika for a second in the corner and she comes bounding over. "They want to talk to you guys."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Should we be nervous?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No. I'm sure it's fine. You just got to be cool. You guys are cool."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're so cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, look at Sam. We're totally cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really nice. You can actually talk like humans. And there, very gently spinning a very nice cocktail, is a mildly irritated-looking Yuri Lowenthal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, this makes so much sense!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It makes so much sense, doesn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He speaks nine languages.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, he's a ninja, for real.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why they never age. The two of them just don't age, do they? He's just peppering with fake color in the hair, that's all it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Yuri!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's up, man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Hey. I mean, this is weird, guys. So what happened? Like honestly, we don't know. No one--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Long story short, Geek & Sundry, Legendary, there's armageddon over there. Monsters roving--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, there was a fire, it's all--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was an explosion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We set it off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You remember Matthew Colville, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, of course."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we woke up in coffins, missing Taliesin. Matt and Marisha were killed while we were trying to figure out what was actually going on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, we'll get to Taliesin. So Colville did this? Was this his doing?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It all sums back to Gary Gygax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Wait. Gygax did this?"

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know if he did it, but he was involved and there's been a changing of the guard or disturbance in the order of things. The lizard people are very upset.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. They said that people go down in their tunnels. They're super pissed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, I was supposed to give you-- I didn't think it would be you, but I'm supposed to say they're very displeased and that we need to make amends. We've got to find a way back to our friendship. You guys are supposed to offer a boon--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who said that? That was--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mahlo, or it was Lockey?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it was the head of the lizard guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "So this is all Gygax? Or was this Colville and Gygax working together?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Gygax said he wanted to play with Matt Mercer, but then Mercer got killed by the sun and so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Why does that guy got to be so weird, man?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't even know he was alive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yuri, I'm so sorry. I've got questions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Sure."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When I met you in '99, 2000, were you

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, no."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So this is somewhere between--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh yeah, this wasn't part of the plan for a while. I've been working towards this, so yeah, "this has been a goal for a while."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Tara, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh yeah, of course."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what about-- offspring is like Alucard? Like halfsies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh no, we're raising him just perfectly. We're trying to do it right, raising "him normally, letting him find himself. It's going to be a while before we--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So how long does it take to actually turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh, it takes about a week and there's a whole ritual that's involved and usually a "becoming, usually somebody-- well, you're supposed to have somebody--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody walked us through it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah. This is a problem. There is--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rats, man. We ate rats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that bad? I didn't mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some of us ate rats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Normally there's a process for this and this is a problem. You're supposed to have a "sponsor. Let's put it this way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Tor Books?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Like Tor Books." Tor Books. "You're supposed to have a sponsor and really, this is "tricky because there's a process to just make sure you don't go around killing people and making a "scene in these things and there's really-- and you guys haven't done anything inappropriate yet, have you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Raise your hand if you haven't done anything inappropriate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I didn't kill any innocent people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, the only person that I killed got burned up in the fire when everything-- so it wasn't like we left any evidence, you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah. Wow."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No bodies around in public places.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Nowhere in public.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm clean as a whistle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And as far as monsters go, thank god we know you, right? Seems like you're pretty high up right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, I mean, I'm not that high up, though. I'm really here because they thought that "you should have a familiar face. And there's a bunch of us here who're in it for you guys, but "there's a lot of conversation about what to do with the four of you. We don't even know what "family you belong to. This is all so complicated."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are families assigned to us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You see, this is the problem."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a foster situation or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) "This is where things get so complicated."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are ready to learn. Spill it, girl. Spill it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, (sighs). We've been giving this a lot of thought, and--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you adopting us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I wish I could. I'm not-- I just don't really have that kind of--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to kill us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "No, I'm not going to do that. But that has come up as an option."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure would love to avoid that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could prove ourselves in a crucible-style--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can get sorted! Give us a family!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're getting ahead of ourselves. Yuri, what's the deal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, you're going to need some kind of sponsor or we're going to have to deal with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we get a sponsor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what do we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I don't know. I guess I'll see if there's anybody around who's up to dealing with this and "we're going to have to get-- I'm going to have to get just a little bit of blood from all four of "you, because we have to figure out who you are and where you belong, so--"

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He pulls out a little pinprick and a couple cups, a couple little wine glasses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stab my newly healing finger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Re-slice open my wrist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look for my big-- this vein and I'm going to stick it in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't really do what you were hoping it was going to do, but you get some stuff out of there. It is as if the circulation is not really moving the way it's supposed to. You can juice it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh. It personally makes me physically uncomfortable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It makes me so happy. It's all I'm really going for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All my veins are noticeably large so I don't think I have a problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you're a little crusty all over too, but you get in there. Your skin got a little crusty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know what's wrong with Liam's face?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Nothing's wrong with Liam's face. It's totally normal."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing's wrong with Liam's face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a little flakey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Almost

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, that's a tricky one. We're going to have to deal with that."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been like that for years, man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much blood do you need? I filled the cup up, like, halfway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, that will do it." So everybody gets a die. You got a hunger die. You got a hunger die. You got a hunger die. You got a hunger die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Billy Mays here for vampirism!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We figured out some of it and thankfully, now "we've contained most of the problem. But we have these four right here. We're getting some results "very soon, but is there anybody in the audience-- is there anybody here tonight who would like to "sponsor one of these four?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take a step forward and say, as a vampire, as a young, junior vampire, I feel like I have a lot to offer. I have strength, maybe not of body, but of spirit, clearly not mind. And I feel like I can make any family proud with my nice-guy attitude and optimism, which are traits that vampires really need. (laughs) Thank you. I yield the rest of my time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. We all have to do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'll tell you what. Really quickly, give me your wits brawl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brawl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wits plus brawl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't understand this game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you don't have to roll it. Just tell me what's your number.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your wits plus brawl is six total? All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why fight when you got up and gave a speech? Is somebody about to fight you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This fight is mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. And give me... roll perception and awareness?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Perception and awareness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Really quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two successes, no fails.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That will do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Kotori. That was the name. Yeah, that was the name of the leader.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My family has chosen me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he die?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you do take four points of health damage. Four serious points of health damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Babe, does it hurt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It hurts!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But in a bearable way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to shove it back through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While you're doing that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait! I turn around to see who did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to turn around and see who did it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You turn around and it is, sadly, Satine who had a stake there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I attack her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She hated your dancing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You shouldn't have tried to hit on that girl after she told you no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they don't like it here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was trying to find out who Yuri was!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yuri Lowenthal is a popular actor in both games and animation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I attack her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Roll a-- let's see, that was a surprise run, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to roll for initiative? How does this work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me a-- what, you're going to try and attack her? Give me another wits brawl. Wits plus brawl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to roll that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, roll that, really quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two success-- three successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a dex dodge. Oh boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three successes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One critical success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One critical success. Yeah, you manage to stumble out of the way and now you're rolling with a piece of wood in your chest. You're now rolling into the front stage. "No takers on that "one," Satine seems to say, looking at the three of you. "Do you have something better to say?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. Should we talk or is it best to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The audience appears to be looking at you. I can't tell you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (strained sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So my wife and I, you know, I think we're open to all scenarios at this point. I'm extremely strong. I'm not terribly ugly. I'll kill anybody you want and I can also talk a lot less than that guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suddenly, out of the crowd--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (strained) He's never killed anyone! He doesn't have any guts!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --Wil Wheaton slowly walks up to you and gives you a big hug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give a big hug back. Please don't stab me in the back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to stab you in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew it. Why is he stabbing me?! Wil! Titansgrave!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll dex dodge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: N-n-n-n-n-nineteen!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll dex dodge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Five gold and a party!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy! Wil rolls really well when I'm rolling for him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh damn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The two of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let this be a succeed at a cost. You give him a shove, but there's like a knife scrapes your back. As you shove away, you take one point of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One point of-- Is that marked off on the health?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the health. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Why? I thought we were buds!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Geek and Sundry is in rubble. It's destroyed. Marisha Ray is gone. You need someone to rebuild the studio and lead it creatively and while I have no experience--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I use Presence Awe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You use Presence Awe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On Wil? On Satine? On who? Erika is also slowly walking towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to kill you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use it on Erika. No, Erika and I, we bonded on Dread.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure you did. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought Wil was my friend!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use it on Erika.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to try and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and I, Erika, will rebuild Geek and Sundry. We will create a nest of creativity and vampirism like the undead have never seen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll your dice, man. That was good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charisma plus persuasion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got it because I didn't say anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, your speech was very poor. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was like the worst Walmart job application ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was so bad it scared me out of talking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I work well with others and I'm quite affable--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two successes, one failure. Nothing on the blood die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She seems receptive to it. She's starting to get that smile.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember those two days on Madness and how fucking cool it was?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone just shoves you from behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Erika. The magic we had, the theatre

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, that did it. And now a stake hits you right in the back. Erika's still staring at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (strained) You want to help me, Erika?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I do, but my boss would get really mad at me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (strained) Who is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And behind you is Felicia Day, staring down going, "No. Oh no."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (strained) I'm clearly out-classed here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. I'm going to try-- I'm going to scream a primal scream and say, I'll show you what a

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll strength brawl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Travis? Did nobody stab Travis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one stabbed Travis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three successes, no fails.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It works! You are pinned to her and she takes the pain and it's-- how much are we doing here? Stakes are mean. You haven't-- and I'm going to let her, since you're now top to bottom and you're holding on. Okay. She is going to just take her knife and start cutting your head right off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I dodge it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are literally pinned to her like a thumbtack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I have an incredibly fast response time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My initiative doubles, can use dodge skill against firearms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, you can try to dodge out of the way. That was a really good-- you just knocked her and she went straight up for it so you should try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what am I rolling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be a-- that's your initiative roll, so it would be a dex dodge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dex dodge. Two successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no. Yeah, you're looking pretty rough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take more points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was five more points of health.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm dead. That's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're starting to powder on the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Horrible,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the Grand Poobah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (strained) That's right. I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a blood die and then roll a...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Loyal as the day is long. Okay. Three successes, no failures.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saved your life!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten thousand years of Day. And not the bad kind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I'm really sorry, Liam, but this is just not the kind of content we're really looking "to make right now. But, really, thank you for everything. Thank you for all of this and I'm so "sorry. Sorry. It's going to hurt a little. I'm trying to make it not hurt. Sorry!" And she takes a stab. Pushes a little deeper. Yeah, you're staked and down and you're not probably getting back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just slashed across the back still?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I could, my wife is a fantastic person and she understands how valuable the relationship between the vampire world and the human world is and how much it must be protected. Such a delicate balance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I read a lot of vampire novels, I've watched a lot of movies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are here to disappear and never cause a bit of trouble and only to learn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I played a vampire in Skyrim, and in Bloodrayne.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yeah, but she tastes of death."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I knew it. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. Nobody told us we weren't supposed to do that. I didn't know. It was fight or flight at that point and as soon we got out to the real world and we were around actual humans and I realised it wasn't the apocalypse--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She was very remorseful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kept him from killing somebody!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would have taken a life if it hadn't been for her. If one of us can only enter this world, I would ask that it be her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, babe. That's really sweet. No, I'm not okay with that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (strained) You were supposed to protect me! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. I'm sorry. I suddenly feel this lingering shame and guilt. But as the person who applied it is now dead, I don't feel--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a charisma persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help him? Can I aid him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you can help him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charisma persuasion. You just add your successes together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could burn a willpower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will burn a willpower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can reroll any you like, as many as you like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a critical success. I have two tens, and two more successes outside of that. So four successes, two of them are critical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I now have five successes and no failures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out of the back room runs Mary Elizabeth, who goes, "I'll take that one! It's "okay. I've got this one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mary, which one? Travis or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "You."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're taking me? You're going to adopt me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She takes you and goes over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. What about Stove?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Satine walks over to you and goes, "Oh no, you're fine. You don't smell of death."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good. No, I would

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well then, we will say, welcome to the Tremere family."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Tremere family!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll train you, we will talk and we will see what else--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we cool that we're still married and we're in different families?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Oh yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "We will sleep for the day and then in the morning we will figure out precisely what it "is that you can do and who may have been responsible for creating you in the first place."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get a hint as to who my honorable sponsor might be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Satine!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Satine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fantastic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Satine's taking you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm thrilled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done for not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's a really good sponsor!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And with that, they lead you to the basement of the club, where there are clean, fresh coffins for everybody to sleep in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happens to those dead bodies that are up there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're powder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As we're dying, I reach my hand and finds Sam's.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hold his hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As we're fading away: (dying voice) Why is our life so ridiculous?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (dying voice) On the next episode of All Work No Play!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, I was really hoping to TPK everyone, but you guys made it through the evening. All you had to do was to kill Diva and that would have been the fucking end of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saved you! See, it was good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, everybody, for letting me--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what happened to Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know what happened to Taliesin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, we don't know what happened to Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know what happened to Taliesin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could we have found him in the one-shot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: We missed him?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was no Taliesin in the champagne room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, was he upstairs with the werewolves?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not going to have a Talks this week because it's Halloween.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Taliesin was in the back room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's here, tonight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where Mary came from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, the back room where Mary was or the back room where--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute. How come Taliesin didn't come to our defense?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because he was in a cage. It's a long story. We'll get there one day. Taliesin was not doing well. He may have done some bad things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May have. Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I've got to say, this is a wonderful system that I'm a very big fan of and thank you all for joining me in this ridiculousness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nicely done!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was really hoping to give you guys the TPK you all wanted but fucking Laura just had to be a good guy and let Diva live. It's okay. It's great. She saved your ass, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then you saved hers, to be fair. She was going to go, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll see you in your dreams, Friedle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if you guys want the v5 alpha, there's a little playthrough online that you can find. I'm sure someone in the chat can lead you to it. Also, Onyx has got reams of stories of the old books for this game, including Live Action Role-Playing. There used to be these great City by Night books: LA by Night, New York by Night and all these wonderful references. I always love that you can pull interesting-- these are great characters for pulling weird historical bits of different cities out, because some of these people actually lived to see it, which is always fun. So yeah, look up the lizard people in LA and those were fun. Those were real things and Los Globos is a weird little club in LA.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still up and running?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still up and running. It's where Das Bunker happens and sorry, Diva, for-- thank god we did not kill Diva and Manzey. We love you both very much. And thank you for everybody who's watched this evening. Thank you for everybody who offered to be a sacrifice for this episode. I did see you, but I was not prepared to kill Critters yet and thank you for not killing the one Critter I gave you. Although I would have been really interested to see if you guys had eaten lizard people. That was an option. Their blood would have been weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Starts taking some of its characteristics?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I had some interesting rules I brewed up for eating lizard people and how it would affect you. This has been fun. This has been exhausting. I can't believe Matt Mercer does this

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My turn. Yeah. Actually, Grog's turn. It's not me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog is DM.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you everybody. I hope you have a wonderful Halloween weekend if you have time tomorrow. Thank you to our sponsor, Tor Books. And if you have time to check out some of our other shows, we've got Madness this weekend that you can check out and Gather Your Party tomorrow, where I'm going to be wearing something super fancy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Thank you all, have a pleasant evening and is it Thursday night yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Happy Halloween!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Happy Halloween! (evil laughter) [music]
